Articles.Content: I was playing around with my spaceplane from KSP1, and let me tell you I am LOVING the procedural wings, but I wanna toggle close the nosecone and switch my rapier to closed cycle. I found the action bar settings, but the key presses don't seem to work. Thankfully you can bring up the window and press it there with the mouse click, but I would like to know if this is broken or if I'm just doing something wrong.
I think this is actually a bug that has been reported.  Many people have complained about the action keys either not working at all or working sporadically.
My action keys were working for a while and then stopped working and I havnt been able to get them to work again. Maybe it has to do with numlock or something.

Not sure what causes it, but ya, mine stopped working as well a few days ago.   I can't even swap my Rapier engines to closed cycle mode anymore.   So hopefully this gets resolved in the upcoming patch.
